name: Dummy
text: I was blown away by how much I enjoyed it.

name: Armaan Rajagopalan
text: 10/10 would recommend. A true masterpiece of cinema. It's a movie I'll never forget.

name: Shamik Walla
text: I was utterly captivated by every moment of it.

name: Kaira Baral
text: The pacing was perfect. I couldn't wipe the grin off my face. The direction was flawless.

name: Zoya Uppal
text: The movie was an unforgettable experience.

name: Ivana Borde
text: I was completely blown away by the sheer talent on display. The chemistry between the actors was palpable. The plot was so engaging, I was on the edge of my seat the whole time.
